Rucio CLI ToolsÂ¶

Rucio provides two command-line tools:

  • man/rucio-admin: Utility for managing and configuring Rucio.
  • man/rucio: Utility for interacting with Rucio.

Examples with rucio-admin command-line tools can be found here: cli_admin_examples.

Examples with rucio command-line tools can be found here: cli_examples.
